com.ftm.iamcore.utils

Class Reflection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ftm.iamcore.utils.Reflection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WhereClauseBuilder

    public class Reflection
extends java.lang.Object
    The Reflection class has methods to invoke getters and setters from a given field of an object.
    Author:
    Favio
